name: Multi-Column Friendica Stream
description: Multi-column stream view lets you browse more posts more quickly and with less scrolling
additional_info:
There's a bug where you may scroll down and then it won't let you scroll up. The "UP" arrow unsticks it.

I'm not sure what's going on or how to fix it. It seems that the left sidebar is doing something fancy with javascript, which results in this buggy behavior.
